name: Bite-Sized Justice
description:
Description:

A tiny lamb wakes up in his barn to a surprising sight, his entire flock has disappeared! Taken by the wolves, caged up in different parts of the world, or hoarded in a cave, the lamb still has a chance to save them before it's too late! Learning how to stand on two legs, with only a stick as his weapon, as nervous as the tiny lamb is, he won't stand by and let them get eaten. Help the little lamb find his family again!

Team Quagsire (Team 3)

Team Members:

Direwolf #9463, HunterZ#6365, Wgeorge#1593, Xiappi#7719, monami#8282, Samhaven#9710
